name: Expert Dino Shooting 3D
description: Enjoy the biggest Expert Dino Shooting 3D game. Become a shooter; enter to the dark forest to hunt or kill the huge dinosaurs with test your best sniper skills and show your real assassination experience.Expert Dino Shooting 3D wonderful simulator is here for your great enjoyment time with Lots of astounding and action levels with stylized stunning graphics and realistic thrilling environments; you can also feel stunning effective sound of weapon shooting and dinosaur violent in this Expert Dino Shooting 3D addictive simulation. In this game you are walking in the forest become a hunt man, equipping with unique rifles, aiming at the powerful dinosaur is around the green fresh jungle areas.
